Text: Thank you so much for the Kai version! I love HD! Your work is much appreciated by me and I know I\'m not the only one! I hope you keep putting them up. They\'ve aired until episode 65 of the 100 episodes so I\'m hooked and waiting till the next! Thanks
I found them on the c-w site! Thanks for the tip and sorry for bothering you with my question to put them up here.
